alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Mayes; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:05PM CDT until May 15 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MAYES...NORTHEASTERN WAGONER AND NORTHERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Wagoner to 4 miles southwest of Locust Grove, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Locust Grove... Peggs... Lost City... Murphy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
